titles.title: SERVE Act of 2009

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a $1,000 refundable credit for individuals who are bona fide volunteer members of volunteer firefighting and emergency medical service organizations.
SERVE Act of 2009
Supporting Emergency Responders Volunteer Efforts Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: Supporting Emergency Responders Volunteer Efforts Act of 2009 or the SERVE Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $1,000 refundable tax credit for individuals who are bona fide volunteer members of a qualified volunteer fire department who provide firefighting, ambulance, or emergency medical services.
